name: hand knitted purple chunky twin cable scarf
description:
A beautiful hand knitted scarf that features twin cables and garter stitch edging, made by Cissyface in her Scottish studio.

The scarf has been knitted using a chunky weight yarn in a beautiful thistle purple. The scarf has a generous length to it and is perfect for keeping nice and warm as the temperatures drop! The yarn shows off all the detail beautifully and the scarf is supple and soft.

complete length: 76"
width: 7"

The yarn is acrylic and can be machine washed separately on a cool wash. Please lie flat and reshape whilst wet, allowing to dry naturally.

name: HALF PRICE - handmade upcycled winter stocking
description:
WAS Â£15

A beautifully made winter stocking, sewn using recycled vintage materials and embellished with handmade pom poms or flowers.

Each and every stocking is different, with it's own personality and look. Perfect not just for the festive period, but throughout Winter! Stockings can be used to hold gifts, but also look lovely simply as decorations. If you would like to hang the stocking empty, I recommend stuffing it with some tissue paper or a piece of card to keep it hanging flat. Our stockings are lined in a plain colour to compliment the outer fabric, come with a natural cotton hanging loop and one of the various hand embellishments.

Each and every stocking is UNIQUE! Even if I use the same fabric for more than one, I will change the lining colour and the embellishment so that no two are alike! This way, you know you are buying something really special!

Approximate measurements: 15" tall and 9.5" wide

name: upcycled vintage material cushion cover - pad not included
description:
Who doesn't love a cushion with some attitude? Want to add some colour to a room, want to soften up any sofa or simply LOVE a vintage print and want to find a way to incorporate one into your home without it taking over the whole space? Our cushion covers are the answer!

Listing is for one cushion cover only (from the choice available in the drop down menu) - cushion pad is NOT included. Should you wish to purchase a cushion pad, we have a separate listing for one that will fit our covers. We list them as covers only to save you money and to stop waste if you already have pads of your own you can use.

Size is a standard 18" square 

All the cushion covers have been made by hand from upcycled vintage materials and have a generous envelope closure on the back. All the inside seams have been professionally finished with zigzag stitching to stop fraying and make them harder wearing.

Cushion covers can be machine washed separately on a 30C cycle. I recommend you allow to dry naturally and iron on a cool setting.

PLEASE NOTE: exact pattern placement will always vary as they are all handmade and the cushion covers pictured are an example of each print and not the exact cushion you will receive

name: Upcycled Luxury Tartan Snood - various tartans & tweeds
description:
Listing is for one luxury snood in a choice of tartans & tweeds available from the drop down menu.

Why should winter accessories be boring?! Make a fashion statement with our Cissyface Vintage snoods!
 
Snoods have gone from strength to strength over the last few winters and heritage look pieces always crop up again and again so our classic snoods are a great way to marry the two concepts AND stay warm when the temperature drops!
 
This snood is amazing!! Great for anyone wanting to be on trend, stay warm and stand out from the crowd this winter! The different tartans & tweeds can be very traditional or oh so fashionable! Wear your snood how you want it, mix up your look and let the gorgeous material do all the talking.
 
All of our snoods are unisex and look equally fabulous on women or men!
 
The snood uses a huge amount of material and is sewn here in our studio by Crystal, our designer. They are surprisingly warm - sure to keep you just as toasty as any of their knitted counterparts! The generous size allows you to pull the snood up fully to create a hood if you so wish or just pile around your neck for a full look.
 
Can be machine washed separately on a cool cycle and ironed at an appropriate setting.

Width laid flat: approx 18.5" 
Length laid flat: approx 29" 

PLEASE NOTE: the Royal Stewart tartan option is a slightly closer fitting snood size with a width of of 16.5" (laid flat). The length is the same. This option would probably be best suited to fit a woman.

name: hand knitted super chunky burgundy scarf
description:
A beautiful hand knitted scarf that has been knitted using 3 strands of yarn to give a really chunky texture, made by Cissyface in her Scottish studio.

The scarf has been knitted using 3 strands of aran weight yarn at once to give an oversized texture. It has been knitted using garter stitch throughout, which makes it a thick scarf with a lovely supple and soft feel to it. Each end features extra long fringing to add to the look when being worn. It is a larger style in a fashionable colour and could be equally fantastic on a man or woman.

length of knitted section: 70" 
width: 8.5"
length of fringe: 9" (each end)
complete length: 88"

The yarn is acrylic and can be machine washed separately on a cool wash. Please allow to dry naturally.

name: Upcycled Fabric Basket - various sizes
description:
Look at these cutie pies!

These fabric baskets can be used for whatever you like and folded flat for storage - how handy! Sewn with a beautiful print on one side and lined in a complimenting flat colour on the other, you can also reverse these baskets inside out for a completely different look! They have cotton tape tabs at the top on each side and are strengthened with interfacing to give them a little more stability, while keeping them soft.

There are a range of 3 sizes to choose from and a whole host of different colour/print combos. Please make your selection from the drop down menu. Listing is for one fabric basket - all of the other items featured in the photos are props only and not included.

Small: length 6" x width 3.5" x height 5"

Medium: length 6.5" x width 5" x height 5.5"

Large: length 7" x width 6.5" x height 6"

All measurements are approximate and items can vary slightly because they are all handmade x

options.name: mixed set of 3 (1 x sml, 1 x med, 1 x lrg): red roses/red

name: Retro Fabric Tie Headband
description:
A shaped fabric double sided headband, which you tie to close! Tie at the front for a very retro look or tie at the back to wear in a classic headband style. Completely adjustable and can be knotted to make it comfortable for any head size!

The bands are made from two complete lengths of fabric sewn back to back, which makes for a comfortable wear and a stylish look with no joins! The bands narrow where they will be tied and then curve back out, which makes it easier to knot and give you a tidy, pretty finish.

Approx length (including ties): 38.5" approx. width: 2.5"

Choose from the drop down menu, which one of the beautiful fabrics you would like!

Can be machine washed on a cool cycle with like colours and ironed.

name: Handy Sewing Kit - in your choice of floral fabric covered tub
description:
A handy dandy sewing kit with oodles of sewing basics! Presented to you in a beautiful tub, covered with vintage inspired fabrics. The lid if the tub is also gently padded so can double up as a mini pincushion.

The sewing kit includes:

- complete set of assorted needles in case
- mini thread scissors
- 25" tape measure
- plastic thimble
- needle threader
- card of assorted thread colours
- card of white elastic
- large spools of thread in white, black, navy, red and green
- mini spools of thread in white and black
- plastic bobbin wound with grey thread
- set of round headed pins
- 6 safety pins
- 6 snap fasteners
- 3 metal fasteners
- 6 large and 6 small spare white buttons

Listing is for one complete sewing set as listed above in your choice of material covered tub as available from the drop down menu.

name: upcycled vintage black, brown and green checked snood
description:
Listing is for one beautiful handmade snood, made from quality recycled wool material.

Why should winter accessories be boring?! Make a fashion statement with our Cissyface Vintage snoods! 

Snoods have gone from strength to strength over the last few winters and heritage look pieces always crop up again and again so our classic snoods are a great way to marry the two concepts AND stay warm when the temperature drops!  

All of our snoods are unisex and look equally fabulous on women or men! 

The snood is sewn here in our studio by Crystal, our designer. They are surprisingly warm - sure to keep you just as toasty as any of their knitted counterparts! 

Can be machine washed separately on a cool cycle and ironed at an appropriate setting.

Width laid flat: approx 18" 
Length laid flat: approx 14"

name: mini lucky dip selection
description:
A super cute little assortment of Cissyface Vintage goodies!

This listing is for one mini lucky dip bag which will include each of the following:

- 1 x pair of earrings
- 1 x domino brooch
- 1 x mirrored acrylic heart brooch
- 1 x doughnut brooch

As the name suggests your lucky bag will be chosen at random from the selection available and the photos in this listing are examples only - not the actual items you will receive.

I have many other earrings so you may receive a pair not in any of the photos. The earring posts are made from low nickel metal and have squidgy plastic butterflies.

name: OOAK - upcycled vintage dark floral circle scarf (pure new wool)
description:
A one of a kind large circle scarf.

A new and funky fashion accessory from Cissyface Vintage! This is one of our new large circle scarves which are all upcycled from vintage skirts! The whole skirt is completely deconstructed and then transformed into this beautiful scarf, giving a large, very generously sized scarf which is UNIQUE to you!

This fabric is a 100% pure new wool! The print is a dark floral in great Autumnal colours.

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.

The scarf is hand wash only and can be ironed on a cool setting.

Width laid flat: approx 16" 
Length laid flat: approx 40.5"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: DISCONTINUED Single Vintage Knitting Needle Bangle
description:
usual price is Â£7 each, but I am no longer making these and so have reduced the price to clear remaining stock!

A simple, but lovely product.

A preloved vintage knitting needle turned into a bangle. Listing is for a single bangle in a choice of colours from the drop down menu. The bangles will vary in thickness, shade of colour and what kind of top they have. Each any every bangle is unique and that is what makes them so special! Please pay close attention to the photos as these are the exact bangles you have a choice from. 

We make the bangles to an average standard size which should fit most wrists, each bangle will vary slightly and we get a lot of requests for more generously sized bangles so... ANY BANGLE WITH (w) AFTER IT IS A SLIGHTLY WIDER FIT, ANY WITH (t) IS A SLIGHTLY TIGHTER FIT.

As with all our vintage materials, please expect some slight wear and tear on the needles. This is all part and parcel of buying vintage and should not be seen as a fault. There may be some discolouration, marks or scratches, but this adds to the look and feel of the piece and reminds you of the journey each piece has taken before Cissyface found them. Also, each bangle will overlap different amounts due to each needle being a slightly different length.

name: Hand knitted Gertrude scarf - merino blend yarn
description:
Designed and handmade by Crystal in her Scottish studio, Gertrude gives you the length and style of a scarf, but can also be worn in many different ways to give you massive versatility!

Gertrude itself benefits from two layers of knitting as it is created in one continuous loop through its entire length. This helps to trap warmth and when doubled up as a cowl, you have an incredible four layers of knitting around your neck. There are also no seams so you can be sure of a flawless look, no matter how you wear it.

There are generously sized handmade pom poms on the scarf which are at the ends of the braided tie sections. They really do look amazing when Gertrude is tied in a bow or create a lovely finished look if worn in other ways.

Knitted with chunky 50% merino / 50% acrylic wool. This one is in a gorgeous light purple colour.

Can be washed separately on a cool 30c, low spin wash and must be left flat to dry naturally. Please do not iron.

name: DISCONTINUED Set of 3 Skinny Knitting Needle Bangles
description:
Usual price is Â£10 for each set, but I am no longer making these and so have reduced the price to clear remaining stock!

A simple, but lovely product.
 
A preloved vintage knitting needle turned into a bangle. Listing is for a set of 3 skinny bangles in a random selection of colours. This is a lucky dip listing and the photos are examples only. You may get any colour combination of bangles, each one will be different. The bangles will vary slightly in thickness, colour and what kind of top they have. Bangles are sold in a set because they are thinner than our single bangles. They are all around 3-4mm wide. Each any every bangle is unique and that is what makes them so special!
 
We make the bangles to an average standard size which should fit most wrists, each bangle will vary slightly. The thinner bangles have slightly more give in them than some of the thicker ones so please bare this in mind.
 
As with all our vintage materials, please expect some slight wear and tear on the needles. This is all part and parcel of buying vintage and should not be seen as a fault. There may be some discolouration, marks or scratches, but this adds to the look and feel of the piece and reminds you of the journey each piece has taken before Cissyface found them. Also, each bangle will overlap different amounts due to each needle being a slightly different length.

name: SPECIAL OFFER - make your own bunting kit
description:
SPECIAL OFFER - for this weekend only, each kit is only Â£5!

This brand new kit has been developed by CV to make 2.5m of double sided bunting from recycled vintage materials. 

The kit includes:

-flag template
-2.5m bias binding
-3 x vintage material
-full instructions

This kit is great for beginners and more experienced sewers alike and it has handy tips throughout the instruction leaflet. It also has a list of "sewing terms" used - perfect for anyone who doesn't know their "seam allowance" from their "bias binding"!

To complete the kit you will also need:

-sewing machine (or needle & thread)
-pins
-scissors or pinking shears
-chalk or pencil
-tape measure

*please note that while the kit can be easily sewn by hand, it will increase the project time considerably*

This listing is for one kit in your choice of materials, which can be selected from the drop down menu.

name: SALE - Upcycled Vintage Material Pin Cushion
description:
WAS Â£6.50

A selection of beautiful vintage materials, transformed into these cute and functional pincushions! Each pincushion is finished by hand with embroidery thread and two vintage buttons (one on each side). They would make lovely gifts for any sewing enthusiast or just a great little addition to your own sewing kit! Plenty room for many pins and sections to keep everything organised.

This listing is for one handmade pincushion from the selection available in the drop down menu.

Each cushion is approx 5.5" in diameter and 1.5" thick. Filled with polyester stuffing.

options.name: vintage red with baby pink thread
white and brown with brown thread
flower power yellow with yellow thread
purple and turquoise with lilac thread

name: OOAK hand knitted chunky cowl/snood - recycled alpaca blend yarn
description:
A beautiful oversized cowl hand knitted by Cissyface in her Scottish studio.

The yarn has been recycled from a cardigan and the exact composition is unknown, there is definitely alpaca in the blend.

The yarn is lovely and chunky, it is quite hairy (which you can just about see in the photos) and very, very warm. The piece is knitted using moss stitch, which creates a thick weave, also adding to the warmth of the cowl.

Moss stitch is the same on both sides so the inside looks just as lovely as the outside when being worn. It is a loose shape and can be worn wrapped twice if you want, but is quite snug that way.

The colour is like a taupe or a beige and there is some variation in the different strands of the yarn.

As I do not know the exact composition of the yarn, I would only recommend hand washing and allowing to dry naturally on a flat surface.

circumference: 40"
height/width: 11.5"

name: fleece snood - various colours
description:
WAS Â£5

Something stylish to keep you warm as the nights draw in and everything gets a little bit colder! A lovely and compact fleece snood in a choice of colours. Can be worn round the neck or pulled up at the back to form the hooded shape and keep you extra warm.

Depending on the colour you choose, these snoods can be completely unisex! A great little gift for anyone of any age.

Colours are: dark red, navy blue, black, pink, purple and green tartan. Please make your selection from the drop down menu.

Approx circumference: 27"
Approx height: 21"

name: hand knitted chunky rib twisted cowl - merino blend yarn
description:
A beautiful twisted rib cowl hand knitted by Cissyface in her Scottish studio.

The yarn is a luxurious 50% merino/50% acrylic blend and is lovely and soft.

The cowl is knitted with a twist and so sits beautifully with no effort! It is ribbed for extra warmth, comfort and stretch and has a seam which runs up the back, which looks lovely and helps it sit high on your neck to keep it covered!

The colour is a rich French navy.

Washing instructions: can be machine washed separately at 30c, do not tumble dry or iron. Reshape and allow to dry on a flat surface to maintain shape.

circumference: 28" 
height/width: 11" (at untwisted section)

name: cushion inner for our upcycled vintage cushion covers
description:
this listing is for one 18" square cushion pad inner to go inside our fabulous handmade cushion covers.

Please only purchase this listing if you are also purchasing a cushion cover that you would like filled. You can purchase multiple pads, one for each cover you would like filled.

Cushion pad cover is 100% polypropylene and can be spot cleaned with a sponge. The filling is 100% polyester. Our cushion inners are non-allergenic, comply to fire regulations and are made in the UK.

name: fabric scrap pack
description:
A scrap pack from my massive stock of vintage and recycled materials.

Pack will come in an A4 pocket. Pieces range from anywhere about A3 in size down to a few inches square. There will be some long, thin strips and also some wider, long pieces. There is a full range of all sizes in all packs and the colours/patterns are chosen to give as interesting/fun a selection as possible.

All materials vary in composition and there will be a lot of cotton/polycotton mixes. As all the materials I use are recycled, there might be a few pieces with edging, fasteners or other embellishments still attached. I have roughly squared off all the pieces to keep them tidy, but they aren't exact. Most of the materials are patterned, but there are a couple of plain coloured pieces.

The packs will not have the same number of pieces because of the different sizes of pieces. They have been made as even as possible, but will vary slightly.

All material is laundered in house when we receive it, but because of the vintage nature of everything we use, there may be the occasional mark. This (if any) will be minimal.

name: OOAK - upcycled vintage blue, rust & black circle scarf
description:
A one of a kind circle scarf.

This fabric has a lovely bold, strong print with a background stripe in black, blue and rust. It has a watercolour/painted look to it. The scarf is lovely and soft.

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.

The scarf material composition is unknown as it was recycled from a hand sewn vintage item. Can be washed on a 30C setting separately and can be ironed if needed on a cool setting.

Width laid flat: approx 13" 
Length laid flat: approx 34"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: Upcycled Vintage Aqua & Blue winter circle scarf
description:
A limited edition of 3.

A warm and "hairy" circle scarf, perfect for the colder weather! A beautiful print in shades of aqua and blue make this scarf both stylish and practical!

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photos. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look.

The scarf is 100% polyester and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, with like colours. 

Width laid flat: approx 12" 
Length laid flat: approx 30.5"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: SALE - Upcycled Mens Tie Beaded Necklace
description:
WAS Â£11

An entire vintage mens necktie, transformed into a beautiful beaded necklace.

The necklace can be tied in a feature bow and kept short or it can be lengthened by tying in a knot at the back for a more simple, draped look.

Each one of these necklaces are unique and all vary slightly with number of beads used, size and type of beads used (glass or plastic) and the width of the tail ends. This is all just because every single element used has been recycled!

The listing is for one unique necklace from the choice available in the drop down menu.

As stated above, all necklaces vary, but they all have a beaded section of roughly 13" and a total length of 35"

options.name: beige with brown mini cube print

name: ooak - upcycled vintage pleated pastels circle scarf
description:
A one of a kind large circle scarf with pleating detail. 

A new and funky fashion accessory from Cissyface Vintage! This is one of the first of our new pleated circle scarves which are all upcycled from vintage skirts! The whole skirt is completely deconstructed and then transformed into this beautiful scarf, retaining the pleating detail and giving a large, very generously sized scarf which is UNIQUE to you! 

The print on this material is an oversized floral in beautiful soft colours.

It wraps comfortably around the neck up to 3 times, which is how it appears in the first photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look or twice as in the second photo. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look. 

The scarf is a synthetic material and can be machine washed on a cool cycle. Lie flat and leave to dry naturally. 

Width laid flat: approx 15" 
Length laid flat: approx 51" 

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: upcycled vintage green & yellow check textured circle scarf
description:
A limited edition of 2.

A colourful and fun circle scarf.

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photos. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look.

The scarf is a textured cotton and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, with like colours.

Width laid flat: approx 11" 
Length laid flat: approx 31"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: SALE - Hanging Hearts - choice of fabrics
description:
WAS Â£12

A beautiful hanging hearts decoration in a selection of upcycled vintage materials. A pretty addition to any room of the house and can be hung off door handles, cupboard handles or any other hook. Why not simply pin one to the wall or hang under a picture?

Listing is for one set of hanging hearts from the selection available from the drop down menu. Each heart is finished off with individual little bow, but if you would rather have them without, you can simply untie them and remove. If you would also like to use the hearts individually as mini cushions, you can snip off the cotton twine and separate them - they would look really cute in a little bowl or one in front of the other on a shelf. The possibilities are endless!

Each one is unique and handmade!

Approx length including top hoop: 19" width at widest point: 6.5"

name: SALE - Stack of Lavender Sachets
description:
WAS Â£6 for a stack of 3 or Â£8 for a stack of 5

A choice of 3 or 5 gorgeous lavender sachets made from a random selection of our vintage material stock, tied in a cute little stack.
 
These Lavender sachets are pretty and practical. Have them in drawers, cupboards, tucked by radiators or even under your pillow!

The sachets are around 3/4 full to give the lavender room to easily move around. This is so that if they ever start to loose their scent, you can pick them up and schmoosh (a technical term) them around a bit to release more of the scent!

Sachets come tied together in a stack, secured with some natural cotton yarn, a Cissyface Vintage tag and a vintage button. They look super cute and make great gifts!
 
I use 100% natural Lavandula X Intermedia Lavender from the fields of Provence.

Please note that sachets can be any colour/print and will be various materials (mainly cotton and poly cotton mixes) chosen at random from our current stock.

Each sachet measures approx 4in square.

*****

Should you be interested in purchasing single sachets in larger numbers for party or wedding favours, please use the contact page to get in touch and we can discuss a custom order.

name: SALE - Giant Cupcake Cotton Shopper Bag
description:
WAS Â£8.50

Be it a book bag, a shopping bag or grocery bag this little cutie will no doubt be very useful indeed! Big enoough for A4 files and folders and with long enough handles to wear over your shoulder comfortably!

Each bag is UNIQUE and has a giant cupcake in various designs sewn onto one side and a cute little Cissyface Vintage cotton tag sewn on the top of the other side. Each giant cupcake is sewn from a mix of vintage material and recycled felt and is finished with a vintage button as a cherry on the top!

Listing is for one bag in a choice of design/material available from the drop down menu.

Bags are made from 100% natural cotton and are undyed. Can be machine washed on a cool cycle. Iron on low setting.

Measurements: bag is 15" wide x 16" tall, handles are 27"

name: Upcycled Vintage Yellow Flower Power Circle Scarf
description:
A funky yellow coloured floral print circle scarf.

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photos. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look.

One of a kind.

The scarf is a soft polycotton mix and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, with like colours.

Width laid flat: approx 11" 
Length laid flat: approx 33"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: SALE - Handmade Upcycled Brushed Cotton Tartan Pouffe
description:
Was Â£39

Footstool, pouffe, somewhere to rest your favourite book or simply to look cute as a decorative item in any room of the house... this little beauty can be anything you want!

The pouffe is handmade by Cissyface in our Scottish studio. It features a reinforced handle on either side, cute little tucking details around the top and bottom, is very generously filled with polystyrene beans and a thick red calico base to make it harder wearing!

The tartan has a black and green base with white, red and yellow lines. The main material is a super soft brushed cotton and the base is a thick red coloured calico. Recycled zip closure across the bottom.

Filling is 100% FRA (Fire Retardant Additive) polystyrene.

PLEASE NOTE: The bag has been filled almost to maximum, but if you prefer more of a schmoosh when you sit - you can simply remove some beans. I'd rather give you too much filling than leave you feeling like you wish it was a bit more plump!

name: TAPE MEASURE BROOCHES - LUCKY DIP SELECTION
description:
This listing is for a selection of 3 tape measure brooches that will be picked at random from our current stock.

You will get one brooch of each style below, but they can be of any colour.

-Rosette 
-Supersized Rosette
-Large Rose Brooch


The combined RRP for these 3 items is Â£20!

name: SALE - Handmade Upcycled Vintage Ditsy Floral Pouffe
description:
WAS Â£39

Footstool, pouffe, somewhere to rest your favourite book or simply to look cute as a decorative item in any room of the house... this little beauty can be anything you want!

The pouffe is handmade by Cissyface in our Scottish studio. It features a reinforced handle on either side, cute little tucking details around the top and bottom, is very generously filled with polystyrene beans and a thick cream calico base to make it harder wearing! 

The ditsy floral print has a mix of peaches, oranges and mustards with pale sage coloured leaves. It is a true vintage beauty and absolutely stunning! The main material is a thick cotton and the base is an even thicker natural coloured calico. Hidden recycled zip closure across the bottom.

Filling is 100% FRA (Fire Retardant Additive) polystyrene. 

PLEASE NOTE: The bag has been filled almost to maximum, but if you prefer more of a schmoosh when you sit - you can simply remove some beans. I'd rather give you too much filling than leave you feeling like you wish it was a bit more plump!

name: SALE - UPCYCLED VINTAGE CIRCLE SCARVES LUCKY DIP
description:
This listing is for a random selection of 3 of our upcycled vintage circle scarves. The RRP of one scarf is Â£15 so you are getting a MASSIVE Â£45 worth of items for only Â£12!!

THE SCARVES WILL BE FROM A SELECTION THAT ARE NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE ON THE WEBSITE. Either past styles OR a completely unique sample styles from our studio.

Each scarf will be slightly different dimensions (as all our scarves are) but will be roughly of standard size which will wrap comfortably around your neck twice.

name: Upcycled Half Pinny With Pockets - Raspberries
description:
Delia, Nigella or the mistress of baking: Mary - eat your heart out! Who could resist a beautiful apron in a kitsch raspberry print?!

A traditional style half apron with double front pocket, gathered detail fixed waistband and generous ties.

I used a genuine vintage apron of my own as inspiration for the design of this piece and it really is a great, classic shape. The original was designed to sit high on your waist so this has a great gathering at the top and a generous length - perfect to protect you from those pesky spills!

As always, it is handmade in our Scottish studio from upcycled vintage material. The apron features a few original seams from the previous use (table runner) which adds a quirky character and vintage charm.

Material is a thicker, waxy style cotton. Can be machine washed separately on a cool cycle and ironed on a low setting.

Waistband: approx. 21"
Length of apron: approx. 22.5"
Length of each tie: 25"

name: Bobbin Earrings
description:
Know someone that loves to sew? What better way to treat them with these great kitsch earrings?!
 
Real bobbins are wound with thread in a colour option of your choice and attached to silver plated earring hooks. Listing is for one set of earrings in a choice of colour. You can choose a colour from the drop down menu below or if you have a special request for a colour not shown, please contact us and we will be happy to make a custom piece - we have an entire rainbow of threads to choose from!

The earrings will come in a gift box, which is handmade by us from a vintage vinyl record sleeve. Each box will be unique and could show any artist/type of music. The boxes are fun and represent perfectly what we stand for as a company! Perfect if you want to give this as a gift as it is already presented in a lovely way.

name: OOAK Upcycled Half Pinny With Pockets - Mens Shirt in Pink
description:
A traditional style half apron with a gathered detail fixed waistband and generous ties.

This apron has been upcycled from a mens shirt and still has the original curved bottom hem and front button closures (sewn shut). It is a one of a kind piece! 

As always, it is handmade in our Scottish studio from upcycled vintage material.

Material is an original poly cotton mens shirt. Can be machine washed separately on a cool cycle and ironed on a low setting.

Waistband: approx. 19" 
Length of apron (at centre front): approx. 19.5" 
Length of each tie: 21"

name: CISSYFACE VINTAGE GOODIE BOX
description:
10 Cissyface Vintage items presented to you in a gift box for Â£10! As simple as that!

You will receive 10 items of Cissyface Vintage past stock or sample pieces. All items will come well packaged and presented. All jewellery or smaller items will each come in an organza gift bag. Each individual item will come with a mini Cissyface Vintage swing card so that if you wish to spilt the items and use as individual gifts, you can.

Guaranteed retail value of Â£30! Will probably be more, but I am stating that as the minimum. I am going to be very generous with these boxes and you will get a good mix of items. 

I have a lot of one off jewellery pieces, earrings, brooches, stationery/cards, magnet sets, tshirt necklaces, decorations... the list is endless.

The items for each box will be chosen to give you a good, well rounded selection.

name: OOAK - Upcycled Vintage Oriental Print Circle Scarf
description:
A one of a kind large circle scarf. 
 
This fabric is a crepe, which drapes beautifully. The floral print has a very oriental look and the strong colours really make it eye catching.
 
It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look, knot it or use a brooch to pin it into different shapes.
 
The scarf is a synthetic material and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, but to preserve the pleating I would recommend hand washing and reshaping to dry. You can iron it on an appropriate setting, but again please be aware of the pleats.
 
Width laid flat: approx 15" 
Length laid flat: approx 31"
 
PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: OOAK - Upcycled Vintage Pleated Blue & Cream Crackle Circle Scarf
description:
A one of a kind large circle scarf with pleating detail.

A new and funky fashion accessory from Cissyface Vintage! This is the first of our new pleated circle scarves which are all upcycled from vintage skirts! The whole skirt is completely deconstructed and then transformed into this beautiful scarf, retaining the pleating detail and giving a large, very generously sized scarf which is UNIQUE to you!

The print on this material is lovely and a mixture of pale blue and a warm cream with a crackle overlay. 
 
It wraps comfortably around the neck up to 3 times, which is how it appears in the first photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look or twice as in the second photo. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.
 
The scarf is a synthetic material and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, but to preserve the pleating I would recommend hand washing and reshaping to dry. You can iron it on an appropriate setting, but again please be aware of the pleats.
 
Width laid flat: approx 13" 
Length laid flat: approx 40" 

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: OOAK - Upcycled Vintage Pleated White & Blue Circle Scarf
description:
A one of a kind large circle scarf with pleating detail.
 
A new and funky fashion accessory from Cissyface Vintage! This is one of our new pleated circle scarves which are all upcycled from vintage skirts! The whole skirt is completely deconstructed and then transformed into this beautiful scarf, retaining the pleating detail and giving a large, very generously sized scarf which is UNIQUE to you!

This fabric is a slightly sheer crepe, which drapes beautifully. The blue and cream print gives it a great summery look. Think sailor chic or why not go for a very patriotic red, white and blue outfit?
 
It wraps comfortably around the neck up to 3 times, which is how it appears in the photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look or twice. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.
 
The scarf is a synthetic material and can be machine washed on a cool cycle, but to preserve the pleating I would recommend hand washing and reshaping to dry. You can iron it on an appropriate setting, but again please be aware of the pleats.
 
Width laid flat: approx 13" 
Length laid flat: approx 39.5"

PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

name: Large Vintage Scarf Wall Hanging - Psychadelic Silk
description:
One of a kind art for your home.

Large 24" x 24" square wall hanging, made using a vintage scarf. This scarf is 100% silk and Made In Italy.

Hand stretched and finished by Cissyface in our studio. Back is beautifully finished with crosgrain ribbon along the raw edges of the canvas.

Nice size for a feature in any room of the house.

As with all of our vintage materials, there may be some slight marks or pulls the scarf. These will only ever be small, we take the greatest pride in our products to ensure they are of amazing quality. They will not detract from the piece as a whole and please do not see them as faults. They are simply evidence of the journey the scarf has been on before we came across it and is partly why vintage is so special.

name: SALE - Vintage Knitting Needle Necklace - Choice of 3 colours
description:
WAS Â£8

A double ended knitting needle, transformed by Cissyface Vintage into a stylish and quirky twisted pendant, which comes on a lovely gold plated trace chain. 

Great for those who love vintage, upcycling and knitting alike, but also a really cute stand alone piece for those who just love a beautiful and unusual necklace! Please check out our other listings for more of our jewellery made from knitting needles!

Listing is for one vintage knitting needle pendant with chain (in a colour selected from the drop down menu), presented in a gift box.

Size of pendant: approx 1.5" tall x 1.25" wide 
Length of chain: 24"

As with all our vintage materials, please expect some slight wear and tear on the needles. This is all part and parcel of buying vintage and should not be seen as a fault. There may be some discolouration, marks or scratches, but this adds to the look and feel of the piece and reminds you of the journey each piece has taken before Cissyface found them.

The necklace will come in a gift box, which is handmade by us from a vintage vinyl record sleeve. Each box will be unique and could show any artist/type of music. The boxes are fun and represent perfectly what we stand for as a company! Perfect if you want to give this as a gift as it is already presented in a lovely way.

name: LIMITED EDITION - Upcycled Vintage Sari Circle Scarf
description:
A limited edition of 5 with 4 standard print scarves and the scarf which has the section of different print being OOAK (seen in the 2nd photo).

A beautiful and luxurious circle scarf made from a vintage sari. The muted beige/brown tones and subtle leaf and paisley print make for a really classic and understated look. The material has a sheer, delicate quality to it and is truely beautiful.

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the first photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.
 
The scarf is made from a vintage sari and will have slight flaws. There are no holes in any of the scarves, but there are areas of slight discolouration, small runs or small stains. These will never detract from the look of the scarf or I would not use them. All of the materials I use are laundered by us in the studio before they are used. Please just be aware of this when purchasing.

Hand wash only, iron on a low setting.
 
Width laid flat: approx 11" 
Length laid flat: approx 31"
 
PLEASE NOTE: this scarf does not come in a gift box as standard, they are available from our homepage should you wish to purchase one.

description:
Traditional Scottish tartan circle scarf in a lightweight cotton.

Perfect with any outfit as a fashionable accessory without the weight or heat of a winter scarf or to carry with you should you want to cover up/keep out a chilly summer breeze. A classic tartan, which is always in style!

It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the first photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look. You could also try knotting it at the front or adding a brooch/pinning it to change the look.

The print has a retro look true to the age of vintage material. Will be a great transitional piece moving towards the colder weather and gives you great coverage without the bulk or weight of a winter scarf.
 
It wraps comfortably around the neck twice, which is how it appears in the photo. You can also just wear it draped once around your neck for a longer look, knot it or use a brooch to pin it into different shapes.
